<title level="1" right="Trait">[Environmental](/Traits.aspx?ID=591)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 329 <sup>2.0</sup>

A hazard with this trait is something dangerous that’s part of the natural world, such as quicksand or harmful mold.
name: Environmental
